name: Martijnvaandering.GitHub.io
body:
### Martijn Vaandering - Father - Dev - TechFreak


>Hi! First of all welcome to my DevPages.
All that's here is my **personal** opinion!

#### Whoami

My name is Martijn Vaandering, i work life and enjoy life in the Netherlands. I'm very down to earth, love my wife and kids and i'm very enthusiastic Software Developer and Software Architect.

I work for a great company called [Rensa](http://www.rensa.nl) and also for our german daughter company of Rensa called [DEWEtech](http://dewetech.de).

#### WhatDoIDo

- C# (main language)
- JavaScript (Browser and NodeJS)
- [Elastic](http://elastic.co) stack (Elastic, Logstash, and Kibana)
- HTML5 & CSS (oh for real??)

#### BlogPosts

I'd like to tell you about a few things in a couple of weeks:

 - Angular coding with a PHP ~~programmer~~ scripter :-)
 - Mocking .net Entity Framework
 - Unit testing Javascript
 - ...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
